items.sentence: It was nice to go back to Boston for the summer.
We stayed at a small hotel just outside of town.
I'm glad the two of you aren't fighting anymore.
Unfortunately, I don't believe Tom will succeed.
Let me point out three mistakes in your article.
Here's a gun. You probably won't need to use it.
Tom thinks it's the smart, sensible thing to do.
I like the way Tom looks with his hair bleached.
That isn't the sort of thing that we like to do.
I feed my cat in the morning and in the evening.
